MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Kirkmahoe and Amisfield. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Our team are onsite repairing a grounded overhead line however the location and complexity of the fault is causing further delays. We now expect your supply to be restored by 11:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:17pm on Saturday 31st October 2020
